metadata.name: Enjoy the Show
metadata.description:
"This piece is a celebration of the dynamic and ever-evolving art world where creativity knows no bounds. From the endlessly reproducible open editions to the one-of-a-kind 1 of 1 masterpieces, every form of art has its own unique charm and deserves to be acknowledged. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the show as we pay homage to the diversity and excellence of the art world."

Burn 2 x this token at a later date to receive the full animated portrait "Sentience".  

This token may have future uses within the MEELO art ecosystem.
